HeaderSection.title: Internxt vs Terabox overview
HeaderSection.description: Discover the key features and differences that allow Internxt to give you back control over your data.

internxtFeatures: Competitive, no hidden costs, up to 5TB
Drive, VPN, Antivirus, Cleaner, Meet, Mail, and more
Full privacy: GDPR, Spanish Data Protection Laws
competitorFeatures: Can access files under certain circumstances
Based in Tokyo, Japanese privacy laws apply

PrivacyViolationsSection.title: Terabox tracks, shares, and monitors your data. Internxt protects it.
PrivacyViolationsSection.description: Terabox may be secure, but it’s a nightmare for your privacy. Switch to Internxt for full security for your documents, videos, and photos.

descriptions: TeraBox collects sensitive data including account info, metadata, and device info. Since they manage encryption keys, they technically can access your data for service provision and compliance.
Terabox pushes ads to free users, which requires data collection. This means your activity and usage patterns can be tracked and shared with advertisers for profit.
Since Terabox manages encryption keys, employees could potentially scan your files. Users have also reported accounts being deleted without notification, leading to permanent data loss.
On a free plan, speeds are heavily restricted. Even after upgrading, users sometimes report little improvement, leaving them with slow transfers despite paying for premium service.

WhyNeedAlternativeSection.title: Why you need a private alternative to Terabox
WhyNeedAlternativeSection.description: What Terabox demonstrates in security fails in terms of privacy. For full privacy, get total security combined with zero-knowledge encryption.

descriptions: Terabox may scan or analyze your files. Internxt has no trackers, no AI scanning, and no hidden backdoors. Your photos and documents remain 100% private.
Terabox manages encryption keys on its servers, giving them total control. Internxt uses client-side encryption, so only you hold the keys to your content.
Terabox collects data through interactions and third parties. Their AI features analyze your files, meaning your data is directly processed by their systems.

VersusSection.title: Internxt vs Terabox
VersusSection.description: Internxt offers unrivaled privacy and security thanks to zero-knowledge, post-quantum encryption.

inxtTable.title: Internxt: Total privacy, transparency, and trust

features.title: Open source
features.description: Internxt's code is open for everyone to examine via GitHub. This transparency guarantees that no vulnerabilities are hidden.

features.title: Zero-knowledge Encryption
features.description: Your data is encrypted on the client side, guaranteeing that only you can access it.

features.title: European cloud storage
features.description: Based in Europe and complies with GDPR, HIPAA, ISO 27001, and SOC 2. Fully audited to ensure no external access.

features.title: Lifetime plans
features.description: Avoid repeated subscriptions with a one-time payment for plans up to 5TB. Access our services forever for {{percentage}}% off.

features.title: Proprietary software
features.description: Terabox keeps its source code hidden. With no transparency, there is no way to verify how they handle or protect your data.

features.title: Encrypted by Terabox
features.description: Terabox holds the encryption keys to your files, meaning they can theoretically decrypt and access your cloud if requested legally.

features.title: Data stored in Japan
features.description: Data stored on TeraBox servers in Japan is subject to Japanese laws, which differ from strict European privacy standards.

features.title: Subscription based
features.description: Only offers monthly or annual subscriptions with a maximum storage of 2TB, lacking lifetime ownership options.

WhyBestAlternativeSection.title: Why Internxt is the best alternative to Terabox
WhyBestAlternativeSection.description: Internxt Drive offers a comprehensive suite of products designed to give you back control of your online privacy.

descriptions: Internxt Antivirus is built directly into your app for full protection against malware, ransomware, and spyware.
Internxt’s VPN protects your browsing, blocks ads and trackers, and keeps your location private from hackers.
Internxt Cleaner helps you identify and eliminate unwanted junk or duplicate files to keep your storage organized.
Internxt Meet is your secure and private alternative for video calls. Protected with post-quantum encryption, free from data collection.
Available on Windows, Mac, Linux, and mobile. For advanced users, we offer support for WebDAV, Rclone, and NAS.

freePlanCard.description: Get 1GB of encrypted cloud storage for free

faq.question: Is Internxt a more secure and private alternative to Terabox?
answer: Yes, Internxt uses post-quantum and zero-knowledge encryption that guarantees nobody but you can view your files.
Terabox manages the encryption keys on its own servers, meaning it could access your files or give access to the government or law enforcement.

faq.question: What is post-quantum encryption, and is it more secure?
answer: Unlike standard encryption, post-quantum encryption algorithms are built to resist powerful quantum attacks, making PQE a more secure Terabox alternative.
This method ensures that your lifetime plan protects you against future cybersecurity threats at no extra cost.

faq.question: Where is Internxt based?
answer: Internxt is based in Valencia, Spain, making it a GDPR compliant cloud storage solution that follows strict European laws.

faq.question: Is Terabox more expensive than Internxt?
answer: With your exclusive {{percentage}}% discount, all our plans are cheaper than Terabox’s current pricing, while offering more privacy features.

faq.question: How do I contact support?
answer: If you have any more questions, you can contact hello@internxt.com and our Customer Success Team will be happy to help.

faq.question: Can I add more storage to my lifetime plan?
answer: Yes, you can upgrade your plan from the settings of your Internxt account or purchase a new plan to stack your storage automatically.

faq.question: Can I pay with credit card, PayPal, or cryptocurrency?
answer: Internxt currently accepts debit and credit cards (Mastercard, VISA, etc), PayPal, iDEAL, Sofort, Cryptocurrency, and Klarna.
